```{asis, echo = {{cov_upload_knit}}, eval = {{cov_upload_knit}}, include = {{cov_upload_knit}}}
Upload covariates from local files and add to the list of covariates - note that you need to specify the directory unless they are in your current working directory.
```

```{r, echo = {{cov_upload_knit}}, include = {{cov_upload_knit}}}

covariate_files <- {{cov_upload_path}}
covariate_directory <- ''
covariate_file_paths <- file.path(covariate_directory, files)
covariate_df <- data.frame(datapath = covariate_file_paths, name = covariate_files)
uploaded_covariates <- disagapp::cov_upload(covariate__df)
covariates <- append(covariates, uploaded_covariates)
```
